$description: Pagination component tokens. Pagination allows navigation through multi-page content. These tokens compose primitive tokens into pagination-specific configurations. Use pagination for: data tables, search results, content archives, galleries. ACCESSIBILITY: Use nav landmark with aria-label, mark current page with aria-current, ensure keyboard navigation between page items.

item.$description: Individual pagination item (page number, arrow) configuration.

sm.$description: Small pagination item size (26px). Compact page numbers for dense layouts.

md.$description: Medium pagination item size (32px). DEFAULT. Standard page number buttons.

lg.$description: Large pagination item size (38px). Touch-friendly page numbers.

borderRadius.$description: Pagination item border radius (4px). Subtly rounded square items.

fontSize.$description: Page number font size per pagination size.

sm.$description: Font size for sm pagination items (12px).

md.$description: Font size for md pagination items (14px). DEFAULT.

lg.$description: Font size for lg pagination items (16px).

fontWeight.$description: Pagination item font weight. Medium weight for clear page number readability.

padding.$description: Pagination item padding. Horizontal padding ensures text content has breathing room within fixed-height items.

sm.$description: Horizontal padding for sm pagination items (8px).

md.$description: Horizontal padding for md pagination items (12px). DEFAULT.

lg.$description: Horizontal padding for lg pagination items (12px).

gap.$description: Gap between pagination items (8px). Enough separation to distinguish individual items.

dots.$description: Ellipsis dots configuration for truncated page ranges.

fontSize.$description: Dots font size (14px). Matches page number size for visual consistency.

duration.$description: Item transition duration (100ms). Quick feedback on hover and selection.
